hourly_rate_range.justification: Senior fullstack developer with AI tool expertise, tight timeline requires premium rate

milestones.name: Foundation & Authentication
milestones.description: User auth for buyers/sellers, basic profiles, project setup

milestones.name: Payments & Polish
milestones.description: Payment integration, admin dashboard, testing, deployment

milestones.name: Buffer & Reviews
milestones.description: Code review cycles, revisions, edge cases, 1000-user load testing

market_benchmark_validation.justification: Pricing at 95% of market benchmark for similar complexity and timeline

assumptions: Client provides wireframes or reference app details within 24 hours of project start
Daily code reviews have 24-hour turnaround time maximum
Scope limited to MVP features only (no advanced features like reviews, ratings, advanced search)
Payment processing is basic (stripe/paypal integration, not custom payment gateway)
No custom design work - using component libraries (Tailwind, shadcn/ui, etc.)
Database and hosting infrastructure decisions made quickly (no extended architecture discussions)
AI tools (Claude) used extensively for code generation and acceleration

risk_notes.risk: Timeline too aggressive - 1-2 weeks may result in incomplete features
risk_notes.mitigation: Proposed 3-week timeline with aggressive 2-week option if scope reduced

risk_notes.risk: Daily code reviews may slow velocity
risk_notes.mitigation: Request 24-hour max turnaround on reviews, batch reviews when possible

risk_notes.risk: Quality sacrifice may create technical debt
risk_notes.mitigation: Define 'functional' clearly - core features work, but may need refactoring post-MVP
Include load testing in buffer milestone, optimize critical paths
Request specific app name or wireframes before starting

scope_clarifications_needed: Which similar app are you referencing? (to understand exact feature set)
What does 'functional for 1000 users' mean specifically? (concurrent users? total users? specific features?)
Are wireframes ready, or should I create them using AI?
What's the specific hourly rate you're considering?
What's the expected code review turnaround time?
